item.description:
Meet at our new temporary home: New Shanghai Restaurant on Hudson St. Sorry, Borders closed unexpectedly early. We'll have dinner so come prepared. (~$13) ALL LEVELS WELCOME!!!  This format is probably even better suited to beginners so please don't hesitate to join us!!

Feel free to bring books, course work, or anything you want to share with the group. All levels are welcome.

Please RSVP responsibly. Thanks.
item.how_to_find_us: Just ask for the meet up group

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Wednesday evening chinese/english language exchange group
